layerPosition.title: Layer position
layerPosition.description: Specifies the position of the layer relative to other map layers

maxZoom.title: Max zoom
maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level where layer is visible

minZoom.title: Min zoom
minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level where layer is visible

scaleHeightOnZoom.title: Scale height on zoom
scaleHeightOnZoom.description: Specifies if the height of the bars should scale relative to the zoom level

scaleThicknessOnZoom.title: Scale width on zoom
scaleThicknessOnZoom.description: Specifies if the width of the bars should scale relative to the zoom level

autoStrokeColor.title: High-contrast outline
autoStrokeColor.description: Makes the outline color contrast with the fill color for better accessibility

blur.title: Blur
blur.description: Amount of blur applied to the outline

clusteringEnabled.title: Cluster bubbles
clusteringEnabled.description: Cluster nearby data points into one bubble to display their aggregate.

logScale.title: Log Scale
logScale.description: Range of input data logarithmically mapped to the minimum and maximum size

matchFillColor.title: Outline matches fill color
matchFillColor.description: Makes the outline color align with fill color

maxRadius.title: Max size
maxRadius.description: Maximum bubble size when scaling the data

pitchAlignment.title: Pitch alignment
pitchAlignment.description: How the bubble looks when the map is pitched

radiusScalingMethod.title: Size scaling method
radiusScalingMethod.description: Scaling algorithm used to determine bubble size

x1.title: X1
x1.description: X1 parameter of a cubic bezier curve

x2.title: X2
x2.description: X2 parameter of a cubic bezier curve

y1.title: Y1
y1.description: Y1 parameter of a cubic bezier curve

y2.title: Y2
y2.description: Y2 parameter of a cubic bezier curve

zoomScaleFactor.title: Zoom scale
zoomScaleFactor.description: Amount the bubbles should scale relative to the zoom level. A zoom scale of one means no scaling. Large values will make bubbles smaller when zoomed out and larger when zoomed in

maxDataValue.title: Max data value
maxDataValue.description: The maximum value of the input data to scale against

minDataValue.title: Min data value
minDataValue.description: The minimum value of the input data to scale against

showNegatives.title: Show negatives
showNegatives.description: Specifies if absolute value of negative size values should be plotted

showZeros.title: Show zeros
showZeros.description: Specifies if points that have a size value of zero should be shown on the map using the minimum radius

unselectedTransparency.title: Unselected data transparency
unselectedTransparency.description: Transparency of unselected data points on the map

heatMapColorCenter.title: 50% gradient stop
heatMapColorCenter.description: The color used in the center of the color gradient

heatMapColorHigh.title: 100% gradient stop
heatMapColorHigh.description: The color used on the high end of the color gradient

heatMapColorLow.title: 0% gradient stop
heatMapColorLow.description: The color used on the low end of the color gradient

heatMapIntensity.title: Intensity
heatMapIntensity.description: The intensity of each data point

heatMapRadius.title: Radius
heatMapRadius.description: The radius of each data point in the heat map

heatMapRadiusUnit.title: Units
heatMapRadiusUnit.description: Use meters or pixels as units to visualize the data

heatMapUseSize.title: Use size as weight
heatMapUseSize.description: Specifies if the size field value should be used as the weight of each data point

labelPrecision.title: Value decimal places
labelPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

position.title: Position
position.description: Select the location for the legend

showTitle.title: Title
showTitle.description: Display a title for legend symbols

autoZoom.title: Auto zoom
autoZoom.description: Allow the map to automatically zoom over the data as the visual updates

autoZoomIncludesReferenceLayer.title: Include reference layer
autoZoomIncludesReferenceLayer.description: Include reference layer data when the map automatically zooms.

centerLatitude.title: Center latitude
centerLatitude.description: Default latitude at the center of the map

centerLongitude.title: Center longitude
centerLongitude.description: Default longitude at the center of the map

defaultStyle.title: Default style
defaultStyle.description: Default style in which the map is displayed

heading.title: Heading
heading.description: Default orientation of the map in degrees, where 0 is north, 90 is east, 180 is south, and 270 is west

pitch.title: Pitch
pitch.description: Default tilt of the map in degrees between 0 and 60, where 0 is looking straight down at the map

showAdminDistrict2Borders.title: County borders
showAdminDistrict2Borders.description: Display the borders for the second-level administrative divisions, such as county borders, on the map.

showAdminDistrictBorders.title: State or province borders
showAdminDistrictBorders.description: Display the borders for the first-level administrative divisions, such as state or province borders, on the map.

showBuildingFootprints.title: Buildings
showBuildingFootprints.description: Display building footprints on the map.

showCountryRegionBorders.title: Country borders
showCountryRegionBorders.description: Display country borders on the map.

showLabels.title: Labels
showLabels.description: Display labels for map elements such as streets and region names.

showNavigationControls.title: Navigation controls
showNavigationControls.description: Allow report readers to zoom, rotate and change the pitch of the map

showRoadDetails.title: Road details
showRoadDetails.description: Adjust the level of detail for visible roads. Turning this off will reduce the number of roads shown on the map.

showSelectionControl.title: Selection Control
showSelectionControl.description: This control lets you draw polygon areas on the map and retrieve all the data points that are within that area.

showStylePicker.title: Style picker
showStylePicker.description: Allow report readers to change the map style

worldWrap.title: World wrap
worldWrap.description: Allow the user to pan the map horizontally infinitively

datasourceType.title: Type
datasourceType.description: Specifies the type of the reference layer data source

referenceLayerUrl.title: Enter a URL
referenceLayerUrl.description: Accepted file formats include GeoJSON, KML, WKT, and shapefiles that are uploaded within a zip file.

eastBounds.title: East bound
eastBounds.description: Eastern longitude of the bounding box where this tile is available

isTMS.title: Is TMS
isTMS.description: Tile Map Services, a specification that reverses the Y coordinate axis of this tile layer

northBounds.title: North bound
northBounds.description: Northern latitude of the bounding box where this tile is available

southBounds.title: South bound
southBounds.description: Southern latitude of the bounding box where this tile is available

tileLayerUrl.title: URL
tileLayerUrl.description: Formatted URL to the tile layer service or TileJSON resource

tileSize.title: Tile size
tileSize.description: An integer value that specifies both the width and height dimensions of the map tiles

westBounds.title: West bound
westBounds.description: Western longitude of the bounding box where this tile is available

showIncidents.title: Incidents
showIncidents.description: Show traffic incidents on the map

showTrafficControl.title: Traffic control
showTrafficControl.description: Allow report readers to turn the traffic layer on or off

layerPosition.description: Specifies the position of the layer relative to other map layers
